Articles.Content:
Since Luigi\'s thread is very old, I decided to make another, with achievements for Minmus too

Mun:

Base on the mun: Forget his name... Challenger pack guy.

Landing on the Mun: HarvestR

Probe: Luigi

Rover: who WAS the first to land a rover....?

satellite: ??

EVA: luigi

Space station: ??

Minmus:

First landing: HarvestR

First public mission (With return): Tim Barrett

Base: ??

Probe:??

Rover:??

Satellite:??

Space station:??
Umm. I was actually the first to land on Minmus. TIm was second. But he did make it back first. You may want to get your facts straight and actually put effort into your thread.
I can barely get orbit with no mods, i don\'t know how you guys get to any other satellite... With mods i cant even then, i am always so close, but miss by a mile (not much i\'m think\'n).
First Mun EVA, ftw. Those four kerbals are still there, on some random patch of munar soil.

Umm. I was actually the first to land on Minmus. TIm was second. But he did make it back first. You may want to get your facts straight and actually put effort into your thread.

Does that count those of us that landed on Minmus during testing before you plebes got it?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Does that count those of us that landed on Minmus during testing before you plebes got it?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

nooope

I can barely get orbit with no mods, i don\'t know how you guys get to any other satellite... With mods i cant even then, i am always so close, but miss by a mile (not much i\'m think\'n).

If you want, use MechJeb, watch how it does orbits and then follow that exactly when you do it yourself. If you don\'t want to use MechJeb then there are plenty of tutorials on YouTube. It\'s all about being high enough and fast enough.

Getting to the Mun is relatively simple, you just have to make your Apogee high enough to intersect the orbit of the Mun.

On topic: I have a couple of satellites orbiting Minimus, though I highly doubt I was the first person to do this. =P

Does that count those of us that landed on Minmus during testing before you plebes got it?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Actually, I got a poll going to see if you guys should be able to compete against us 'plebes' in achievements. Community decided it was a big nope. Also, congrats on your 3000th post whenever you get it.
How about if one of the testers did something noteworthy after the official release?
DOH! I launched a space station into Munar orbit and never took a picture of it.

First public mission (WITH RETURN): Tim Barrett

Base: ??
You still don\'t have first landing. So yeah. You may want to order it like my thread.
